title: Wolverine, Volume 1: Wolverine Goes to Hell
description: Acclaimed author Jason Aaron (Astonishing Spider-Man and Wolverine, Wolverine: Weapon X) and superstar artist Renato Guedes (Action Comics, Adventures of Superman) launch an all-new Wolverine series as Wolverine goes to hell... literally!Someone's out to destroy Wolverine-permanently-and they may have succeeded. But if Wolverine's soul is in hell, how is his body terrorizing those closest to him?Collecting: Wolverine 1-5
author: Jason Aaron
